Action.author: nishi
Action.body: Note: It was observed that when the same chaincode was instantiated from two different channels with same name only one container was created.

Action.author: scottz
Action.body: FAB-5676 is not done in v1.1, so this is an invalid testcase in v1.1. The upgrade doc now specifies the need for the operator (out of band) to delete the chaincode images while the peer is stopped when changing the peer version. When we did that, things worked. It is now a part of the fabric-test/features/upgrade.feature test If and when FAB-5676 is done in future releases, then we will need to modify this testcase upgrade.feature) to remove the step that manually removes the images (and enhance verify steps as needed,
